thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 70 of 7291
thread.title: Lorinda

author: Lorinda
title: Lorinda
text: After chatting with the sales people and doing my own research on independent sites to verify what they said, I finally purchased the lens I've wanted for years! Canon's 11-24 F4 zoom. I can't wait to get it and use it this coming weekend! B&H was very patient and helpful in helping me determine the lens I needed. They were worried about my budget and suggested a couple other lenses, but I really wanted the best and went with the Canon at the end of all of our conversations. I hope it's as good as all the reviews I've read.
